  • java.lang.Object

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HardcodedColumn, NiComputedColumn, SqlSourcedColumn

    public abstract class NiReportColumn<K extends Cell>
extends NiReportedEntity<K>
    a NiReports definition of a column
    1. name
    2. fetching
    3. use as a hierarchy
    4. behaviour under aggregation, filters, etc
      5. s
